name: MPSCNNNeuronType
desc: The types of neuron filter to append to a convolution.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A neuron type indicating no neuron filter.

items.name: case reLU
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a rectified linear unit neuron filter.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a linear neuron filter.

items.name: case sigmoid
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a sigmoid neuron filter.

items.name: case hardSigmoid
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a hard sigmoid neuron filter.

items.name: case tanH
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a hyperbolic tangent neuron filter.

items.name: case absolute
items.desc: A neuron type indicating an absolute neuron filter.

items.name: case softPlus
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a parametric softplus neuron filter.

items.name: case softSign
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a softsign neuron filter.

items.name: case ELU
items.desc: A neuron type indicating a parametric exponential linear unit neuron filter.
